venue.address_1: Corner of JFK Street and Eliot Street
venue.name: Dunkin Donuts

item.description: Join me for the Cambridge River Festival Saturday, June 2nd from noon-6pm. This FREE event along the banks of the Charles River features jazz, folk, Latin and world music performances, dance, art demonstrations, family art-making activities and over 100 specialty food purveyors and craftspeople! http://www.cambridgema.gov/CAC/Community/CRF_2010_Schedule.cfm?minor In addition to the River Festival, on the same day and in the same place is the Figment Project, which is a "celebration of participatory art and culture". http://figmentproject.org/2010/events/figment-boston-2010/ I think that this would be a good way to meet other Boston Creative People!
item.name: Cambridge River Festival Saturday June 2nd
